title: Play Protect can now remove permissions of unused apps on Android 10 and older devices
content:
Google Play Protect can now remove the permissions of unused apps, a safety & privacy feature of Android 11 now available for older phones and tablets.

description: Google Play Protect can now remove the permissions of unused apps, a privacy feature of Android 11 now available for older devices.
